radio.label: DUM_COUNTRY
radio.title: Demography: Country

radio.label: DUM_PARAMOUNT_STUDY
radio.title: Paramount study flag

radio.label: COUNTRY
radio.title: In which country do you live?

radio.label: GENDER_FULL
radio.title: Which gender do you identify as?

radio.label: GENDER_SHORT
radio.title: Which gender do you identify as?

radio.label: DUM_GENDER
radio.title: Gender dummy
radio.row: Male = CODES 1-2 AT GENDER_FULL OR 1 AT GENDER SHORT
Female = CODES 3-4 AT GENDER_FULL OR 2 AT GENDER SHORT
Other/prefer not to say = CODE 5-7 AT GENDER_FULL OR 3 AT GENDER SHORT

radio.label: DUM_AGEBREAK
radio.title: Age dummy

block.label: UK_POSTCODE

text.label: POSTCODE
text.title:
Please enter the first part of your post code below. To be clear, we only want the part of your post code before the space!

Please use caps lock – text box is case sensitive

block.exec: if RECORD: print RECORD DUM_POSTCODE_INFO.r1.val = RECORD['postcode'] DUM_POSTCODE_INFO.r2.val = RECORD['name'] DUM_POSTCODE_INFO.r3.val = RECORD['region/country']

radio.label: REGION_UK
radio.title: In which of the following regions do you live?

block.label: US_ZIPCODE

text.label: STD_ZIPCODE_US
text.title: Please enter your 5-digit ZIP code below.

block.exec:
RECORD = ZIPCODES.get(STD_ZIPCODE_US.val )
if RECORD: DUM_Zipcode.r1.val = RECORD['cityname'] DUM_Zipcode.r2.val = RECORD['msa'] DUM_Zipcode.r3.val = RECORD['msa_name'] DUM_Zipcode.r4.val = RECORD['state'] DUM_Zipcode.r5.val = RECORD['statename'] DUM_Zipcode.r6.val = RECORD['censusdivision'] DUM_Zipcode.r7.val = RECORD['censusdivisionname'] DUM_Zipcode.r8.val = RECORD['censusregion'] DUM_Zipcode.r9.val = RECORD['censusregionname']

radio.label: DUM_State
radio.title: Hidden Marker : US State

radio.label: DUM_CensusDivision
radio.title: Hidden Marker : US Census Division

radio.label: DUM_REGION
radio.title: CODE REGION BASED ON ZIP CODE

checkbox.label: QC_WEEKEND
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of the following have you done over the past weekend?

radio.label: DUM_QCFLAG_WEEKEND
radio.title: Hidden VARIABLE for QC_WEEKEND

checkbox.label: DEVICES_HHLD
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of these devices do you have in your household, even if you don’t personally use them?
checkbox.row: Tablet (e.g., iPad, Android tablet, Amazon Fire tablet, etc.)
Smart TV (i.e., TV with internet capabilities built in)
Video game console (e.g., Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, etc.)
Connected TV device/stick (e.g., Roku, Amazon Fire TV, Apple TV, Google Chromecast, Android box, etc.)
Smart Speaker with a screen (e.g., Amazon Echo, Google Nest Hub with Smart Display, etc.)
Set-Top Box from my cable/satellite TV provider
DVD or Blu-ray player (not in a laptop)
VR (Virtual Reality) headset (e.g. Google Cardboard, Oculus Rift)

checkbox.label: INDUSTRY
checkbox.title: Do you, or does anyone in your household, work in any of the following industries?

term.label: TERM_IND
term.cond: INDUSTRY.r1 or INDUSTRY.r2 or INDUSTRY.r3 or INDUSTRY.r4 or INDUSTRY.r5

radio.label: QC_DOG_CONSENT
radio.title: Are you using a screen-reader or any other assistive technology to complete this survey?

checkbox.label: QC_DOG
checkbox.title: Here are some pictures of dogs. Please select images that show real dogs

radio.label: DUM_QC_DOG
radio.title: Dog QC result

radio.label: USA_ETHNICITY_1
radio.title: Are you Spanish, Hispanic, or Latinx such as Mexican, Mexican-American, Chicano, Puerto Rican, Cuban, or another Spanish, Hispanic, or Latinx group?

checkbox.label: DUM_US_ETH_1
checkbox.title: Ethnicity 1

radio.label: USA_ETHNICITY_QUOTA
radio.title: HIDDEN QUESTION FOR USA ETHNICITY QUOTA

radio.label: QC_ATTENTION
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that each of the words below describe you?

radio.label: DUM_QCFLAG_ATTENTION
radio.title: Hidden VARIABLE for QC_ATTENTION

radio.label: QC_CONTRADICTION
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree with each of the following statements?
radio.row: I love shopping for things online
I can accomplish anything I want if I work hard enough
The music I listen to is an important part of my identity
These days having access to the internet is a basic human right
I hate shopping for things online
Everyone should be responsible for protecting the environment

radio.label: DUM_QCFLAG_CONTRADICTION
radio.title: Hidden VARIABLE for QC_CONTRADICTION

radio.label: DUM_QCSCREENER_TERM
radio.title: Hidden VARIABLE to Term people who failed 2 QC checks
